hero.title: Hi! I'm scar R贸denas
hero.description: Full-Stack Developer specializing in Laravel and Vue.js, with experience in process automation and data management. I'm looking for my first professional opportunity in web development.

education.title: Academic Background
education.degree: Higher Technician in Web Application Development (DAW)
education.description: Specialized training in full-stack web development, with an emphasis on modern technologies such as Laravel, Vue.js, and MVC architectures. Practical experience in real projects during the professional internship period.

soft_skills.title: Soft Skills
soft_skills.problem_solving_desc: Analytical approach to find efficient solutions
soft_skills.learning_desc: Always exploring new technologies and methodologies
soft_skills.proactivity_desc: I take initiative to improve processes and results

list.title: Higher Degree Web Application Development Internship
list.description: During my internship, I participated in the development of innovative software solutions, focusing on:
achievements: Developed a Python automation application that processed over 1,000 Excel records daily, reducing manual processing time by 70%.
Implemented scripts for data extraction and transformation, improving data accuracy by 95% and accelerating processing by 50%.
Actively participated in weekly team meetings, contributing to project planning and presenting progress, leading to a 15% increase in team productivity.
Created detailed documentation for implemented processes and solutions, facilitating knowledge transfer and reducing onboarding time for new team members by 20%.

list.title: Personal Portfolio
list.description: My personal website developed with Astro and Tailwind CSS. This project showcases my skills in modern web development, implementing features like dark mode, internationalization (i18n), and responsive design. It uses technologies such as Astro for optimal performance, Tailwind CSS for design, and vanilla JavaScript for interactivity.

list.title: Hotel Management Project
list.description: Web application for hotel management developed with Laravel on the back-end and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the front-end. It includes features for managing rooms, reservations, hotels, and clients. Additionally, a more visual website for the hotel chain was developed with Laravel and Vue.js, using APIs from the management web's database.

list.title: Auction Management Project
list.description: Web application for auction management developed with PHP on the back-end and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the front-end. It includes functionalities for the auctioneer role, who manages all auctions and client products, and for clients, who can upload their products.
